name: FungLife
description:
In a world that obeys the law of the jungle, it is eaten or be eaten...

And then you got this fungus that only proliferates by getting consumed by something else, which is like totally overpowered. But the point is: how good can you spread?

Try to beat my score! Personal best: 10320

------------------------------------------------------

FungLife is a game made for GameDev.tv Game Jam with the theme: "Death is only the beginning." This is my first game jam, so hope you guys enjoyed it!

Github: https://github.com/Ticxo/FungLife
